item.title: Ramon add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "We'll meet at the theater tonight. I'll hold your seat 'til you get there. Once you get there; you're on your own." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas I'll never know." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Indeed I have always been of the opinion that hard work is simply the refuge of people who have nothing to do." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ramon add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "I'm living so far beyond my income that we may almost be said to be living apart." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: Ramon add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description:
"may i feel said he (i'll squeal said she just once said he) it's fun said she
(may i touch said he how much said she a lot said he) why not said she
(let's go said he not too far said she what's too far said he where you are said she)
may i stay said he (which way said she like this said he if you kiss said she
may i move said he is it love said she) if you're willing said he (but you're killing said she
but it's life said he but your wife said she now said he) ow said she
(tiptop said he don't stop said she oh no said he) go slow said she
(cccome?said he ummm said she) you're divine!said he (you are Mine said she)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Photons have mass? I didnâ€™t even know they were Catholic." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I like to have a martini, Two at the very most. After three I'm under the table, after four I'm under my host." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "It is with books as with men: a very small number play a great part." -- Voltaire

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him." -- Voltaire

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Pierre-Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais
item.description:
"Nowadays what isn't worth saying is sung.
(<i>Aujourd'hui ce qui ne vaut pas la peine d'Ãªtre dit, on le chante.</i>)" -- Pierre-Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais

item.title: Ramon add a quote by W. C. Fields
item.description: "I like children. If they're properly cooked." -- W. C. Fields

item.title: Ramon add a quote by W. C. Fields
item.description: "Take me down to the bar! We'll drink breakfast together!" -- W. C. Fields

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "Anybody who hates dogs and babies can't be all bad." -- Leo Rosten

item.title: Ramon add a quote by W. C. Fields
item.description: "I always keep some whiskey handy in case I see a snake...which I also keep handy." -- W. C. Fields

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "Boy, those French! They have a different word for everything." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Ramon add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges
